channel.title: Mobile on rsalas:blog()
channel.description: Recent content in Mobile on rsalas:blog()

item.title: The Unintended Impact of Crashing my Phone
item.description: Yes, my really nice Samsung Galaxy Note 4, with an excellent camera, perfect size, and bright screen… Coming out of an Uber in front of my house at night, fell on a second curb that was put there for protection. I was about to give 5 stars to my driver, when baam! Face down. Since my phone was in my hand, it landed screen down with all my weight. The poor thing kept vibrating at random intervals with no other visible activity.
